text:
After checking out your options, stop asking, “What should I say yes to?” Instead, flip the script and ask: “What will I say no to?” 🙅‍♂️ This question digs deep into your real priorities. It helps you find the best way forward for your team. Plus, it reveals your true purpose and boosts your impact—not just for your goals, but for your organization’s mission too. This simple question can give you the clarity you need to make game-changing breakthroughs in your career and life. ✨

**PAGE SUMMARY:** The essential question to uncover true priorities and purpose is not what to say yes to, but what to say no to.
